name: Blenture Software
overview:
Blenture is a mobile software company based in Israel, and the creator of Playrock.

Playrock is a social mobile network in which people can create virtual local spaces and use apps in real time with people nearby. Each space has its own set of apps that determine the nature of the space. Spaces can be created at any location, reflecting day-to-day interactions, either among friends and colleagues or people who meet casually in a bar or other location. These spaces allow users to utilize multi-device apps, discover new apps, and share experiences with each other.

Playrock offers app developers an SDK for developing applications to run inside its spaces. With it, any single-player game can become multi-player by providing access to resources and offering tools to connect users.
